link.description:
The React Frontend, Express Node.js Backend Workshop is a hands-on training that will teach you how to build full-stack web applications using React.js and Node.js. 
    You will learn how to use React to create user interfaces and how to use Express Node.js to create backend RESTful APIs.
    The workshop will cover the following topics: React basics, Express.js, Node.js, Integrating ReactJS and Express, Building a full-stack web application, 
    Deploy React frontend and Express backend application to AWS cloud.
    The workshop is designed for developers who are familiar with JavaScript, and who want to learn how to build full-stack web applications using React and Node.js.
